Package main.model

Class GlobalState

java.lang.Object
main.model.GlobalState
public class GlobalState extends Object
GlobalState Class use Singleton Design Pattern to provide Global Access Point to only one instance. It is use to store the Public Stage, User Information of current Login Session. This allow different classes to access to the same Stage, User Information.
